whoAreWe.title: Who are we?
whoAreWe.body: Syntax is the student association for the Department of ICT and Natural Sciences at NTNU Ålesund.

sponsor.title: Sponsors
sponsor.body: Our main sponsors are twoday and Sparebank 1 Møre.

companiesInfo.title: For companies
companiesInfo.body: Syntax acts as the link between studies and working life. Check out what we can offer your company.
